tool_description: The openSquat is an open-source project for phishing domain and domain squatting detection by searching daily newly registered domains impersonating legit domains.
title: openSquat

api_list.name: Get Daily Domains
api_list.description: Get the daily list of domains that have been registered in the past day that have a similar word to {keyword} - the keyword should not contain any domain, e.g: Google
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opensquat1.p.rapidapi.com/{keyword}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opensquat1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the newly registered domains that resemble the word Amazon?
I want to find domains registered yesterday that look similar to Netflix.
Please provide a list of recent domain registrations that mimic the term Spotify.
Could you get me the daily domains that have been registered with names close to Tesla?
Show me the domains registered in the last day that are similar to Airbnb.
Find the newly registered domains that imitate the word Facebook.
List the domains registered recently that have names resembling Twitter.
Get the daily list of domains that have been registered and are similar to LinkedIn.
I need to see the domains registered yesterday that look like Zoom.
Retrieve the list of new domains registered in the past day that are close to the word Slack.
